result.arabic_text: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ukuri kutagiramwo amakenga ku vyerekeye Isa mwene Mariyamu, ni ukuri kwagushikiriye kuvuye ku Mana yawe Rurema Allah. Kubera ivyo rero, shishikara utsimbataye kuri ukwo kuri, ntukabe mu bagufiseko amakenga.
